00064 static orxBOOL sbStopByEvent = orxFALSE;

00075 static orxSTATUS orxFASTCALL orx_DefaultEventHandler(const orxEVENT *_pstEvent)
00076 {
00077   orxSTATUS eResult = orxSTATUS_SUCCESS;
00078 
00079   /* Checks */
00080   orxASSERT(_pstEvent->eType == orxEVENT_TYPE_SYSTEM);
00081 
00082   /* Depending on event ID */
00083   switch(_pstEvent->eID)
00084   {
00085     /* Close event */
00086     case orxSYSTEM_EVENT_CLOSE:
00087     {
00088       /* Updates status */
00089       sbStopByEvent = orxTRUE;
00090 
00091       break;
00092     }
00093 
00094     default:
00095     {
00096       break;
00097     }
00098   }
00099 
00100   /* Done! */
00101   return eResult;
00102 }
00103 
00106 static void orxFASTCALL orx_MainSetup()
00107 {
00108   /* Adds module dependencies */
00109   orxModule_AddDependency(orxMODULE_ID_MAIN, orxMODULE_ID_PARAM);
00110   orxModule_AddDependency(orxMODULE_ID_MAIN, orxMODULE_ID_CLOCK);
00111   orxModule_AddDependency(orxMODULE_ID_MAIN, orxMODULE_ID_CONFIG);
00112   orxModule_AddDependency(orxMODULE_ID_MAIN, orxMODULE_ID_INPUT);
00113   orxModule_AddDependency(orxMODULE_ID_MAIN, orxMODULE_ID_EVENT);
00114   orxModule_AddDependency(orxMODULE_ID_MAIN, orxMODULE_ID_FILE);
00115   orxModule_AddDependency(orxMODULE_ID_MAIN, orxMODULE_ID_LOCALE);
00116   orxModule_AddDependency(orxMODULE_ID_MAIN, orxMODULE_ID_PLUGIN);
00117   orxModule_AddDependency(orxMODULE_ID_MAIN, orxMODULE_ID_OBJECT);
00118   orxModule_AddDependency(orxMODULE_ID_MAIN, orxMODULE_ID_PROFILER);
00119 
00120   orxModule_AddOptionalDependency(orxMODULE_ID_MAIN, orxMODULE_ID_SCREENSHOT);
00121 
00122   return;
00123 }

00164 extern orxSTATUS (orxFASTCALL *spfnRun)();
00165 
00173 static orxINLINE void orx_Execute(orxU32 _u32NbParams, orxSTRING _azParams[], const orxMODULE_INIT_FUNCTION _pfnInit, const orxMODULE_RUN_FUNCTION _pfnRun, const orxMODULE_EXIT_FUNCTION _pfnExit)
00174 {
00175   /* Inits the Debug System */
00176   orxDEBUG_INIT();
00177 
00178   /* Checks */
00179   orxASSERT(_u32NbParams > 0);
00180   orxASSERT(_azParams != orxNULL);
00181   orxASSERT(_pfnRun != orxNULL);
00182 
00183   /* Registers main module */
00184   orxModule_Register(orxMODULE_ID_MAIN, orx_MainSetup, _pfnInit, _pfnExit);
00185 
00186   /* Stores run callback */
00187   spfnRun = _pfnRun;
00188 
00189   /* Registers all other modules */
00190   orxModule_RegisterAll();
00191 
00192   /* Calls all modules setup */
00193   orxModule_SetupAll();
00194 
00195   /* Sends the command line arguments to orxParam module */
00196   if(orxParam_SetArgs(_u32NbParams, _azParams) != orxSTATUS_FAILURE)
00197   {
00198     NSAutoreleasePool *poPool;
00199 
00200     /* Allocates memory pool */
00201     poPool = [[NSAutoreleasePool alloc] init];
00202 
00203     /* Launches application */
00204     UIApplicationMain(_u32NbParams, _azParams, nil, @"orxAppDelegate");
00205 
00206     /* Releases memory pool */
00207     [poPool release];
00208   }
00209 
00210   /* Done! */
00211   return;
00212 }

00214   #endif /* __orxOBJC__ */

00216 #else /* __orxIPHONE__ */

00225 static orxINLINE void orx_Execute(orxU32 _u32NbParams, orxSTRING _azParams[], const orxMODULE_INIT_FUNCTION _pfnInit, const orxMODULE_RUN_FUNCTION _pfnRun, const orxMODULE_EXIT_FUNCTION _pfnExit)
00226 {
00227   /* Inits the Debug System */
00228   orxDEBUG_INIT();
00229 
00230   /* Checks */
00231   orxASSERT(_u32NbParams > 0);
00232   orxASSERT(_azParams != orxNULL);
00233   orxASSERT(_pfnRun != orxNULL);
00234 
00235   /* Registers main module */
00236   orxModule_Register(orxMODULE_ID_MAIN, orx_MainSetup, _pfnInit, _pfnExit);
00237 
00238   /* Registers all other modules */
00239   orxModule_RegisterAll();
00240 
00241   /* Calls all modules setup */
00242   orxModule_SetupAll();
00243 
00244   /* Sends the command line arguments to orxParam module */
00245   if(orxParam_SetArgs(_u32NbParams, _azParams) != orxSTATUS_FAILURE)
00246   {
00247     /* Inits the engine */
00248     if(orxModule_Init(orxMODULE_ID_MAIN) != orxSTATUS_FAILURE)
00249     {
00250       /* Registers default event handler */
00251       orxEvent_AddHandler(orxEVENT_TYPE_SYSTEM, orx_DefaultEventHandler);
00252 
00253       /* Displays help */
00254       if(orxParam_DisplayHelp() != orxSTATUS_FAILURE)
00255       {
00256         orxSYSTEM_EVENT_PAYLOAD stPayload;
00257         orxSTATUS               eClockStatus, eMainStatus;
00258         orxBOOL                 bStop;
00259 
00260         /* Clears payload */
00261         orxMemory_Zero(&stPayload, sizeof(orxSYSTEM_EVENT_PAYLOAD));
00262 
00263         /* Main loop */
00264         for(bStop = orxFALSE, sbStopByEvent = orxFALSE;
00265             bStop == orxFALSE;
00266             bStop = ((sbStopByEvent != orxFALSE) || (eMainStatus == orxSTATUS_FAILURE) || (eClockStatus == orxSTATUS_FAILURE)) ? orxTRUE : orxFALSE)
00267         {
00268           /* Sends frame start event */
00269           orxEVENT_SEND(orxEVENT_TYPE_SYSTEM, orxSYSTEM_EVENT_GAME_LOOP_START, orxNULL, orxNULL, &stPayload);
00270 
00271           /* Runs the engine */
00272           eMainStatus = _pfnRun();
00273 
00274           /* Updates clock system */
00275           eClockStatus = orxClock_Update();
00276 
00277           /* Sends frame stop event */
00278           orxEVENT_SEND(orxEVENT_TYPE_SYSTEM, orxSYSTEM_EVENT_GAME_LOOP_STOP, orxNULL, orxNULL, &stPayload);
00279 
00280           /* Updates frame counter */
00281           stPayload.u32FrameCounter++;
00282         }
00283       }
00284 
00285       /* Removes event handler */
00286       orxEvent_RemoveHandler(orxEVENT_TYPE_SYSTEM, orx_DefaultEventHandler);
00287 
00288       /* Exits from engine */
00289       orxModule_Exit(orxMODULE_ID_MAIN);
00290     }
00291 
00292     /* Exits from all modules */
00293     orxModule_ExitAll();
00294   }
00295 
00296   /* Exits from the Debug system */
00297   orxDEBUG_EXIT();
00298 }

00300   #ifdef __orxMSVC__

00302   #define WIN32_LEAN_AND_MEAN
00303   #include <windows.h>
00304 
00310 static orxINLINE void orx_WinExecute(const orxMODULE_INIT_FUNCTION _pfnInit, const orxMODULE_RUN_FUNCTION _pfnRun, const orxMODULE_EXIT_FUNCTION _pfnExit)
00311 {
00312   #define orxMAX_ARGS 256
00313 
00314   int   argc;
00315   char *argv[orxMAX_ARGS];
00316   char *pcToken, *pcNextToken, *pcFirstDelimiters;
00317   LPSTR lpFullCmdLine;
00318 
00319   /* Gets full command line */
00320   lpFullCmdLine = GetCommandLineA();
00321 
00322   /* Starts with a double quote? */
00323   if(*orxString_SkipWhiteSpaces(lpFullCmdLine) == '"')
00324   {
00325     /* Gets first delimiters */
00326     pcFirstDelimiters = "\"";
00327   }
00328   else
00329   {
00330     /* Gets first delimiters */
00331     pcFirstDelimiters = " ";
00332   }
00333 
00334   /* Process command line */
00335   for(argc = 0, pcNextToken = NULL, pcToken = strtok_s(lpFullCmdLine, pcFirstDelimiters, &pcNextToken);
00336       pcToken && (argc < orxMAX_ARGS);
00337       pcToken = strtok_s(NULL, " ", &pcNextToken))
00338   {
00339     argv[argc++] = pcToken;
00340   }
00341 
00342   /* Inits and executes orx */
00343   orx_Execute(argc, argv, _pfnInit, _pfnRun, _pfnExit);
00344 }
